name: Dutchman’s Daiquiri
description: Genever, lime and a chile pepper apparently they like it spicy in Holland.
ingredients: quarter Red chile pepper, seeded and sliced
1⁄2 oz Rich sugar syrup (2 parts sugar, 1 part water)
directions: In a shaker, muddle the chile.
Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice.
Shake, and double-strain into a Martini glass.
Garnish with a red chile pepper.
